select case when express_departure_size between 0 and 10 then '0평 - 10평 이하' when express_departure_size between 10 and 20 then '10평 초과 - 20평 이하' when express_departure_size between 20 and 30 then '20평 초과 - 30평 이하' when express_departure_size between 30 and 40 then '30평 초과 - 40평 이하' when express_departure_size between 40 and 50 then '40평 초과 - 50평 이하' else '50평 초과' end as 'range',
count(*) as 'number_of_size'
from express
where DATE_FORMAT(express_req_date, '%Y-%m') = #{expressReqDate}
group by case when express_departure_size between 0 and 10 then '0평 - 10평 이하' when express_departure_size between 10 and 20 then '10평 초과 - 20평 이하' when express_departure_size between 20 and 30 then '20평 초과 - 30평 이하' when express_departure_size between 30 and 40 then '30평 초과 - 40평 이하' when express_departure_size between 40 and 50 then '40평 초과 - 50평 이하' else '50평 초과' end
